snippet: Ushers who work at Islanders home games are preparing for the team’s move to Barclays Center, which will be its home rink beginning next season.
abstract: Nassau Coliseum ushers, like 81-year-old Mike Artusa, are among New York Islanders fans sad to see team moving to Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: Ushers who work at Islanders home games are preparing for the team’s move to Barclays Center, which will be its home rink beginning next season.

headline.seo: Ushers for the Islanders Revel in Their Role
